title: 关于命令方块召唤怪物的问题
author: aill
txt_content: /summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"Zombie ",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:0,Count:1},{id:381,Count:3,tag:{display:”Name:123”}},{id:381,Count:3},{id:384,Count:10},{id:381,Count:3}],DropChances:[1.0F,1.0F,0.5F,1.0F,0.1F], Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:120},{Name:generic.followRange,Base:6},{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:0.3},{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:0.3},{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:6}]}用这个命令召唤成功了，掉落物也正常，但掉落物名字没变，比如123这个名字没有，掉落物还是显示末影之眼

replies.author: 小白勇者
gamemode3
replies.txt_content:
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ 
{CustomName:"Zombie ",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:0,Count:1},{id:381,Count:3,tag:{display:”Name:123”}}},{id:381,Count:3},{id:384,Count:10},{id:381,Count:3}],
DropChances:[1.0F,1.0F,0.5F,1.0F,0.1F]
, Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:120},
{Name:generic.followRange,Base:6},
{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:0.3},
{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:0.3},
{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:6}]}
 楼主试试这个↑

replies.author: aill
replies.txt_content:
gamemode3 发表于 2015-2-9 13:20
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ 
{CustomName:"Zombie ",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:0,Count:1},{id:381,C ...
你这个没对哦

replies.author: aill
replies.txt_content:
小白勇者 发表于 2015-2-9 13:24
您好,请将命令修改为:
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"Zombie ",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id: ...
哦，我知道哪出问题了，谢谢解答
